thread.title: Naked gunman kills four at Waffle House in Tennessee

title: Naked gunman kills four at Waffle House in Tennessee

organizations.name: view transcript  metro nashville police department

text:
Naked gunman kills four at Waffle House in Tennessee 8:26am EDT - 02:01 
Metro Nashville Police Department Spokesman Don Aaron says a naked gunman opened fire at a Waffle House near Nashville, Tennessee early Sunday morning killing four people and injuring several others. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Metro Nashville Police Department Spokesman Don Aaron says a naked gunman opened fire at a Waffle House near Nashville, Tennessee early Sunday morning killing four people and injuring several others.
